verses.verse: He showed <S%H7200><s%> me Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and Satan <S%H7854><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> at his right hand <S%H3225><s%> to be his adversary. <S%H7853><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Satan, <S%H7854><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> you, <S%H7854><s%> Satan! Yes, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh who has chosen <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> you! <S%H181><s%> Isn't this a burning stick plucked <S%H5337><s%> out of the fire? <S%H784><s%>"
Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was clothed <S%H3847><s%> with filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> and was standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel. <S%H4397><s%>

He answered <S%H6030><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to those who stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Take the filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> off <S%H5493><s%> of him. <S%H559><s%>" To him he said, "Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have caused your iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> from you, <S%H3847><s%> and I will clothe you with rich clothing. <S%H4254><s%>"

I said, <S%H559><s%> "Let them set <S%H7760><s%> a clean <S%H2889><s%> turban <S%H6797><s%> on his head. <S%H7218><s%>" So they set <S%H7760><s%> a clean <S%H2889><s%> turban <S%H6797><s%> on his head, <S%H7218><s%> and clothed <S%H3847><s%> him; <S%H899><s%> and the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was standing by. <S%H5975><s%>
The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> protested <S%H5749><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'If you will walk in my ways, <S%H1870><s%> and if you will follow <S%H8104><s%> my instructions, <S%H4931><s%> then you also shall judge <S%H1777><s%> my house, <S%H1004><s%> and shall also keep <S%H8104><s%> my courts, <S%H2691><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you a place of access <S%H4108><s%> among these who stand by. <S%H5975><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> now, <S%H3091><s%> Joshua the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> you and your fellows <S%H7453><s%> who sit <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H582><s%> for they are men who are a sign: <S%H4159><s%> for, <S%H935><s%> behold, I will bring forth my servant, <S%H5650><s%> the Branch. <S%H6780><s%>

For, <S%H68><s%> behold, the stone that I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Joshua; <S%H3091><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> are seven <S%H7651><s%> eyes: <S%H5869><s%> behold, <S%H6605><s%> I will engrave its engraving, <S%H6603><s%>' says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> <S%H4185><s%> 'and I will remove the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of that land <S%H776><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

In that day, <S%H3117><s%>' says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> <S%H7121><s%> 'you will invite every man <S%H376><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> under the vine <S%H1612><s%> and under the fig tree. <S%H8384><s%>'"
